There's one more reason for the jam  a good example is on the pie towards jurong  just after kallang bahru exit  many queued up to cut to the lane towards CTE at the beginning of the joining lane  when there's a good few kilometers stretch ahead to time the switch. I always stay on 2nd or 1st lane to overtake the queue and cut in halfway between the kallang bahru exit and the CTE/pie split.

Also  the slip road into CTE towards aye after pie towards jurong  cars queue up to cut into lane 4 just after the slip road joins CTE  when there's a good few kilometers stretch till balestier exit. I always keep left on the slip road to pass the queue and ease into CTE midway before the balestier exit
